verses.name: Exodus 26:20
verses.text: And for the second side of the tabernacle on the north side there shall be twenty boards:

verses.name: Exodus 26:21
verses.text: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.

verses.name: Exodus 26:22
verses.text: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward thou shalt make six boards.

verses.name: Exodus 26:23
verses.text: And two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.

verses.name: Exodus 26:24
verses.text: And they shall be coupled together beneath, and they shall be coupled together above the head of it unto one ring: thus shall it be for them both; they shall be for the two corners.
